ComicInfo.Title: Death Sentence; Vendetta; House Call!; Motive Unknown; The Evicted Ghosts; The Amazing Return of Harvey Trent; Henpecked
ComicInfo.Summary: 1: Death Sentence 2: Vendetta * 3: House Call!4: Motive Unknown * 5: The Evicted Ghosts * (This story is also reprinted in Mystery Comics Digest #22) 6: The Amazing Return Of Harvey Trent 7: Henpecked * Reprintend from Grimm's Ghost Stories (Gold Key) #6
